about_the_game:
"Please complete your work and restore company order"

"Moirae：The Doll Of Clotho Building" is a single-player RPG-style story-driven puzzle exploration game. Players can immerse themselves in the game world by exploring and experiencing the narrative at the same time.

Story

The story is set in a futuristic high-tech society where people gradually discover many special non-human creatures, some of which even have abilities that science cannot explain, and thus they are contained and observed. Due to an unknown accident, the Moirae company where the protagonist works has a containment breach, causing the creatures to go into a state of chaos and escape.

features

．2D horror adventure game with exploration and action elements
．A timely gun battle system
．Diversified non-human roles
．Present important plot in 2D animation
．Multiple endings

Precautions

This work contains bloody, violent and horrible performances.
The performance will involve the following performances: continuous shaking of the screen, noise and screaming effects, and flickering of the screen.

It is recommended for players over 15 years old to play, while players under 15 years old should consider playing on their own.
If you encounter physical discomfort during the game, please stop playing.

This story is pure fiction. If there is any similarity, it is pure coincidence.
Please do not imitate the performance of the characters in the play.

Instructions

．【↑↓←→】：move
．【Z】、 【Enter】：investigation、 dialogue、 confirm
．【X】、 【Backspace】：open menu、 cancel
．Press【Shift】run (Can be switched between options)
．Press【Z】、【X】can speed up dialogue and plot presentation
．When video playing press【ESC】can skip
．F4：full screen、windowization (Going full screen may result in lower quality)
．F5：Restart the game

This work contains bloody, violent and horrible performances.
The performance will involve the following performances: continuous shaking of the screen, noise and screaming effects, and flickering of the screen.

It is recommended for players over 15 years old to play, while players under 15 years old should consider playing on their own.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15.3
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Quad-Core Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics

name: Moirae：紡生之樓的人偶

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The story tells the story of the protagonist who has lost his memory, waking up in a company that houses many non human creatures. While avoiding the ferocious creatures, he seeks a way to escape. Gradually, the protagonist regains his memory but discovers that he has a more important mission to do.
